titleStmt.title: Theologicall logicke: or the third part of the Tryall of truth wherein is declared the excellency and æquity of the Christian faith, and that it is not withstood and resisted; but assisted and fortified by all the forces of right reason, and by all the aide that artificiall logicke can yeeld. ... By Iohn Terry Minister of the Word of God at Stocton.
Triall of truth. Part 3
titleStmt.author: Terry, John, 1555?-1625.

notesStmt.note: At least the British Library copy has a final quire: 2G⁴ with Questions handled in the third part and errata--STC. Pagination does not include this quire.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
